publication.title: A High Performance Parallel IP Lookup Technique Based on Multiprocessor Organization and CREW PRAM
publication.jconf: Asia International Conference on Modelling and Simulation
publication.keyword: High Performance;Ip Lookup;Ip Routing;Time Complexity;Longest Prefix Matching;
publication.abstract: The IP Lookup Process is a key bottleneck in routing due to the increase in routing table size, increasing traffic and migration to IPv6 addresses. The IP routing lookup involves computation of the Longest Prefix Matching for which existing solutions, such as BSD Radix Tries, scale poorly when traffic in the router increases or when employed for IPv6 address lookups.

publication.title: Video Shot Boundary Detection Using Generalized Eigenvalue Decomposition
A New Quantized Input RLS, QI-RLS, Algorithm
Video Retrieval Using Generalized Eigenvalue Decomposition
publication.jconf: International Conference on Image Processing, Computer Vision, and Pattern Recognition
